subject: Flock Safety Search Tool Certification
body:
You don't often get email from jessi.roman@flocksafety.com. Learn why this is important <https://aka.ms/LearnAboutSenderIdentification>  
	

[EXTERNAL ?]

Hello,

We are pleased to congratulate you on passing the Flock Safety Search Tool Certification! The Search Tool serves as your command center for retrieving any image captures from the Flock Cameras located in your community. Users who master this tool are the most effective at solving and eliminating crime. 

Keep an eye out for new certifications courses being added into the Help Center https://help.flocksafety.com/s/topic/0TO4v000000c5BXGAY/certification-program . You'll have access to additional curriculum and certification assessments. 

Please note, if you've completed multiple certifications, you will receive a separate email with each certificate. 

Best,

Jessi Roman

Customer Education Manager
